All Classes

Class Summary
Class Description
BaronCard
This card subclass contains the unique functionality of the Baron Card.
Card
This is the abstract parent class from which the various child classes are extended.
ChatClient
This class creates the socket for the client.
ChatServer
This class mainly deals with establishing connection between server and client and helps in communication between different users.
CountessCard
This card subclass contains the unique functionality of the Countess Card.
GameBoard
In a newly created game, an instance of the GameBoard class is created in which the deck of cards is created and a winner of the game is determined by creating and running instances of the Round class until one player has won.
GameController
The GameController mainly handles the communication between the chat and the game.
GuardCard
This card subclass contains the unique functionality of the Guard Card.
HandmaidCard
This card subclass contains the unique functionality of the Handmaid Card.
KingCard
This card subclass contains the unique functionality of the King Card.
Player
For each user who plays the game, a Player object is created.
PriestCard
This card subclass contains the unique functionality of the Priest Card.
PrinceCard
This card subclass contains the unique functionality of the Prince Card.
PrincessCard
This card subclass contains the unique functionality of the Princess Card.
ReaderThread
It reads (for the client) the servers input constantly and prints it out on the console.
Round
This class is responsible for executing one single round.
User  
UserThread
Handles connection for each connected client.
WriterThread
This class reads the input of the user, first gets the username and then it reads messages until the user types bye.
